mapper.select: select count(*) from review where rev_oi_seq = #{oi_seq};
select AVG(rev_rate) as rev_rate_avg from review where rev_pi_seq= #{pi_seq} group by rev_pi_seq;

select rev_status,rev_seq,si_seq,rev_reg_dt,rev_mod_dt,rev_rate,pi_name,pi_price,rev_content,mi_id from member_info a inner join (select * from seller_info a inner join (select * from review a inner join product_info b on a.rev_pi_seq = b.pi_seq )b on a.si_seq = b.pi_si_seq) b on a.mi_seq = b.rev_mi_seq where si_seq=#{si_seq} order by rev_reg_dt desc limit 10;

select rev_seq,si_seq,rev_reg_dt,rev_mod_dt,rev_rate,pi_name,pi_price,rev_content,mi_id from member_info a inner join (select * from seller_info a inner join (select * from review a inner join product_info b on a.rev_pi_seq = b.pi_seq )b on a.si_seq = b.pi_si_seq) b on a.mi_seq = b.rev_mi_seq where si_seq=#{si_seq} and rev_seq =#{rev_seq} order by rev_reg_dt desc limit 10;
select * from review_answer where ra_si_seq=#{si_seq} and ra_rev_seq=#{rev_seq}
select pi_si_seq from product_info pi2 where pi_seq= #{prod_seq}

select rev_status,rev_seq,si_seq,rev_reg_dt,rev_mod_dt,rev_rate,pi_name,pi_price,rev_content,mi_id from member_info a inner join (select * from seller_info a inner join (select * from review a inner join product_info b on a.rev_pi_seq = b.pi_seq )b on a.si_seq = b.pi_si_seq) b on a.mi_seq = b.rev_mi_seq where pi_seq=#{prod_seq} order by rev_reg_dt desc
select a.*,b.pi_name ,b.pi_price from review a inner join product_info b on a.rev_pi_seq = b.pi_seq where rev_mi_seq =#{seq};
select count(*) from review a inner join review_answer b on a.rev_seq = b.ra_rev_seq where ra_rev_seq= #{seq};
